## RLog.tag property

The tag of this [RLog](./rlog.rlog.md) instance.

Tags are used for filtering logs.

See [withTag](./rlog.rlog.withtag.md) for more details.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly tag: string | undefined;
```
